author: gartung
body: These are ifdef'ed with __APPLE__ so they should not interfere with linux compilations. I had to add /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/include/c++/v1 to ROOT_ICLUDE_PATH before /usr/include/c++/4.2.1 to ensure that the correct header were picked up by genreflex. I also ensure that the cxxflags had this correct as well.
title: Fixes for changes in location of apple clang's libc++ header locations
